name: Clockwork Pugilist
description: A mechanical fighter with solid armor, designed for combat. It has a tough exterior and features dual fist attacks.
memorable: Combines strong melee capability with defensive abilities, making it a tough opponent for low-level adventurers.
goals: To engage in direct combat, protecting allies and attacking enemies.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other constructs or guardians in combat scenarios.
environment: Often found in battle arenas or as guardians in a workshop or magical facility.
strengths: High Strength score provides potent melee combat, immune to common conditions and damage types.
weaknesses: Very low Intelligence limits its ability to engage in complex problem-solving.
attacks: Utilizes powerful fist attacks, including a special ability for strategic repositioning in combat.
most_powerful_ability: Brass Onslaught allows for movement without provoking opportunity attacks and deals extra damage.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet and a passive Perception score of 13.
skills: Boasts average perception skills with a +1 modifier.
additional_information: Immune to spells that alter its form due to Immutable Form.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep as a Construct.
Enhanced survivability through Magic Resistance, providing advantage on saving throws against spells.
test_queries: construct that protects allies in combat
aggressive pugilist with powerful melee abilities
battle-ready construct immune to many effects
